messages.title: STANDING UP FOR YOUR COMMUNITY
messages.content: Westminster politicians have failed us all on Brexit. Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote. Greens would campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.

messages.title: NO TO CLIMATE CHANGE
messages.content: For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action, protects nature, creates better transport, warmer homes and hundreds of thousands of new jobs.

messages.title: A FAIRER BRITAIN
messages.content: Greens will take action to transform Britain so that it works for everyone. We propose a Britain of 'us and those' created by the Brexit vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackle climate chaos, protect nature, and create jobs through better transport and warmer homes.
A commitment to job creation through environmental initiatives.
Supporting a referendum to decide the future of Brexit with a campaign to Remain.
A pledge towards rebuilding and strengthening public services.

issues.brexitEurope: Westminster politicians have failed us all on Brexit. Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote. Greens would campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.
issues.economy: Greens will take action to transform Britain so that it works for everyone.
issues.environment: For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos.

housing.content: Tackle climate chaos, protect nature, and create jobs through better transport and warmer homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Peter Underwood is a politician you can trust.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of Croydon Friends of the Earth
politicalExperience.achievements: Supporting community groups to look after precious parks and woodlands.

endorsements.endorsement: Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now—please vote Green.

quotes.text: Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest.

images.caption: Group of people holding Green Party placards and signs, with a caption 'STANDING UP FOR YOUR COMMUNITY.'
Peter Underwood, Green Party Candidate for Croydon South.
